title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H1 – Jul 20 2021
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H1 – Jul 20 2021
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 1: Governor Ron DeSantis of Florida on the government’s hypocrisy of open borders for illegals and closed borders for citizens. Fauci, Rand Paul trade 'lying' accusations about gain-of-function research in hearing on delta variant. UK Prime Minster Boris Johnson takes another step closer to vaccine passports. NIH director backs masking in schools, says it's not 'asking people to go to the trenches'. Author Michael Wolff slams Stelter to his face: "You're full of sanctimony," you're why "people can't stand the media."

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
